title: Missing data in report
description: When generating a customer report, some data is missing. It appears that certain customer records are not being included in the report.

title: Incorrect product information
description: Some product information is incorrect on the website. The descriptions and/or prices for certain products do not match the actual products.

title: Error when saving changes to order
Incorrect calculation in inventory management system
description: The inventory management system is displaying incorrect quantities for some items. The actual quantity in stock does not match the quantity shown in the system.

title: Error when adding new product
description: An error message is displayed when attempting to add a new product to the website. The message states that the action could not be completed due to an unknown error.

title: Incorrect display of product images
description: Some product images are not displaying correctly on the website. The images are either distorted or not showing up at all.

title: Login issue for certain users
description: Some users are unable to log in to their accounts. An error message is displayed stating that the username or password is incorrect, even though the user is certain that their login information is correct.

title: Error when updating product information
description: An error message is displayed when attempting to update the information for a product. The message states that the action could not be completed due to an unknown error.
